title: CENOCOELIINAE GENERA OF THE NEW WORLD

states: with lateral carina weak or absent, at most weakly developed anteriorly
with strong and complete lateral carina in anterior half or more
characters.name: median cavity <antennal scrobe> of frons <presence of lateral carina>

states: evenly curved and not strongly protruding posteriorly
characters.name: occipital carina <protruding posteriorly>
scutellum with minute posterior transverse depression <presence>
groove on medial surface of hind coxa of female <presence>

states: ending ventrally basal to or at midlength of coxa
ending ventrally distal to midlength of coxa
characters.name: groove on medial side of hind coxa of female <position>

states: at least as long as vein 1M
characters.name: hind wing crossvein r-m <length compared to vein 1M>

states: at least 3 times longer than apical width
less than 3 times longer than apical width
characters.name: median tergite of first metasomal segment <length compared to apical width>

states: with acute lateral margins absent posteriorly
without acute lateral margins; median tergite not distinguished from laterotergites
characters.name: median tergite 3 <presence of acute lateral margins>
